title: SET_TEXT_DROPSHADOW
content:
0x465C84BC39F1C3510xE6587517// SetTextDropshadow
void SET_TEXT_DROPSHADOW(int distance, int r, int g, int b, int a);Parameters:distance: Shadow distance in pixels, both horizontal and vertical.r: Red color.g: Green color.b: Blue color.a: Alpha.distance - shadow distance in pixels, both horizontal and vertical
r, g, b, a - color
